div.p: The Golden Plains School District is committed to providing high quality education to all students. Our staff provides a caring and compassionate environment as well as rigorous and challenging curriculum. Communication between parents, community and school is imperative.

div.a: 22000 Nevada Street San Joaquin, CA 93660 United States

strong.span: All GPUSD Schools will be closed until Ma
Todas las escuelas GPUSD están cerradas hasta el 4 de Mayo de 2020

span.strong: El Servicio de Comidas Continuará Entre Las 11 a.m. y la 1:00 p.m.

Para los siguientes lugares: Helm Elementary, Cantua Elementary, Pecks, Halfway, Garden Valley y Three Rock Area Primaria San Joaquín Tranquility Elementary y Tranquility High se servirán en Tranquility High
Meal Service will continue between 11 am and 1:00 PM for the following locations:
Helm Elementary, Cantua Elementary & Three Rock Area, Pecks, Halfway, Garden Valley, San Joaquin Elementary, Tranquillity Elementary and Tranquillity High will be served in Tranquillity High

strong.a: Please visit www.gpusd.org/2020/03/coronavirus-covid19-updates for updates and information
